About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Dedicated to creating beautiful outdoor spaces since 2010.
About.storyP1: Duwane's Landscaping and Lawn Service started with a simple mission: to provide high-quality, reliable landscaping services to our local community. Over the years, we have grown from a small two-person team to a full-service landscaping company, but our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction remains the same.
About.storyP2: We believe that your outdoor space should be an extension of your homeâ€”a place to relax, entertain, and enjoy nature. Whether you need a complete garden redesign or just regular lawn maintenance, we treat every project with the same level of care and attention to detail.

values.quality: Quality: We never cut corners and use only the best materials.
values.reliability: Reliability: We show up on time and finish the job as promised.
values.integrity: Integrity: We are honest, transparent, and fair in all our dealings.
values.customerFocus: Customer Focus: Your satisfaction is our top priority.

About.testimonial: Duwane's Landscaping transformed our backyard into a stunning oasis. The team was professional, courteous, and the results exceeded our expectations.
About.ctaSubtitle: Experience the difference of working with a professional landscaping team.

Reviews.title: What Our Clients Say
Reviews.subtitle: We take pride in our work and our customers love the results.
Reviews.review1: Duwane's team did an amazing job on our front yard. Highly recommended!
Reviews.review2: Professional, on time, and great attention to detail. My lawn has never looked better.
Reviews.review3: Great price for the quality of work. Will definitely use them again.
